question: I have had type 1 diabetes for 36 yrs and gastroparesis for half that time.  Two yrs ago I underwent surgery and had g & j tubes placed, as I'm no longer able to keep down food.  I receive liquid feedings via the j tube at night.  The surgeon who did my initial procedures was going to place a gastric pacemaker, but he relocated and I'm currently without a surgeon.  I'm told that there are no surgeons in my area that do gastric pacemaker placement.  I'm wondering if there is a list of surgeons that perform this surgery in or around the Albany NY area?
title: Gastric Pacemaker surgeons?
